channel.title: Went from 19'' 1600x900 to 27'' 1920x1080, screen lag (or mouse polling rate)
channel.description:
The monitor is 60hz and its the same brand as my old monitor which had excellent colors and it was very smooth. But now when I play games even 60 fps doesn't feel as smooth. The monitor has a 2ms draw time which is pretty fucking fast.
Could this be an issue with my mouse being a bit too sensitive for such a big area? Or could my mouse (polling rate?) be slower on this shitty mouse and more noticeable on a big screen? Could it be more touchy now? I understand that adding 30k more pixels can slow my fps down, but I even lowered a few settings to keep it at 60 fps and I can't tell if its the monitor or my view panning across a more complex/busy area.
